name: Titanium Shovel
description: The Titanium Shovel is an upgrade to thePlatinum Shovel, offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability. Like its predecessor, it can be used to createDirt Mounds(right-click), harvestIce/Dirt/Sand(left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in theArctic/Volcanicbiomes on Icarus.
